annotations.description: One of my favorite bars of all time was Audrey Saunders' Pegu Club in NYC, and sadly it is no more. Today I make a signature drink from the menu that will bl...
annotations.title: Earl Grey MarTEAni from Audrey Saunders | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Simple Syrup
.75 oz. -or- 22 ml. Lemon Juice
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Infused Gin
1 egg white

dry shake
shake again and strain into sugar rimmed coupe
garnish with a lemon twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xAT8iGPDYB8
title: Earl Grey MarTEAni
